input.sentences: this is a picture of two men .
this is a picture of a boat .
this is a picture of two friends .
this is a picture of three men .
this is a picture of a man wearing orange .
output.sentences: The picture was of two men.
They took the picture when they were on their boat.
In the picture, two of their friends were drinking coffee.
There was another picture; this time, it was of three men.
What the man was wearing in the last picture was an orange jacket.
